item.title: 人工智能时代，微软将外包更多软件销售业务
item.description: 微软公司正计划利用第三方公司处理更多面向中小型客户的软件销售业务，这与同行在人工智能时代调整销售策略的努力不谋而合。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is planning to use third-party firms to handle more sales of software to small and mid-size customers, echoing efforts by its peers to adjust sales strategies in the age of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 非洲最新股票市场与 Ethio Telecom 举行首次公开募股仪式
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚在其移动网络运营商 Ethio Telecom 首次公开募股中筹集了 32 亿比尔（合 2400 万美元）。【原文：Ethiopia has raised 3.2 billion birr ($24 million) in its maiden initial public offer in mobile-network operator Ethio Telecom.】

item.title: DoorDash 要求法官撤销 Uber 对网络订餐服务的诉讼
item.description: DoorDash Inc.要求加州法官驳回优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc）对其提起的反竞争诉讼，辩称优步利用 "不合适的 "州法律为其主张辩护。【原文：DoorDash Inc. asked a California judge to dismiss Uber Technologies Inc.’s anti-competition lawsuit against it, arguing that Uber is using an “ill-fitting” state law to justify its claims.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织成员认为世界正处于贸易战的 "关键时刻
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund, 简称 "基金组织"）成员在经过一周的讨论后，在一份声明草案中表示，随着贸易紧张局势的加剧，世界经济正处于一个 "关键时刻"。【原文：The world economy is at a “pivotal juncture” as trade tensions flare, members of the International Monetary Fund said in a draft statement after a week of discussions that have been overshadowed by US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑修改最低税法以缓和美国紧张局势
item.description: 欧盟下周将考虑对 15%的最低企业税法进行可能的修改，以缓和与美国的紧张关系。【原文：The European Union next week will consider potential changes to its 15% minimum corporate tax law in a bid to ease tensions with the US.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德认为欧元区通胀率将徘徊在 2% 目标值附近
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，通货紧缩 "已步入正轨"，同时警告说，高度的不确定性导致无法发出明确的利率信号。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said that disinflation “is well on track,” while warning that high uncertainty makes it impossible to give clear signals on interest rates.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）初步批准向斯里兰卡提供 3.44 亿美元贷款
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）与斯里兰卡达成了员工层面的协议，为释放现有 30 亿美元贷款计划下的下一批资金铺平了道路。【原文：The International Monetary Fund reached a staff level agreement with Sri Lanka, paving the way toward unlocking the next tranche of funds under an existing $3 billion loan program.】

item.title: 经济学家称贸易战使美国经济衰退几近硬币翻转
item.description:
接受彭博社调查的预测人士认为明年经济下滑的可能性从3月份的30%上升至45%。【原文：

Forecasters surveyed by Bloomberg now see a 45% of a downturn in the next year, up from 30% in March.

】

item.title: 特朗普政府施压欧洲拒绝人工智能规则手册
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府正在向欧洲施压，要求欧洲放弃一项规则，该规则将迫使高级人工智能开发商遵守更严格的透明度、风险缓解和版权规则标准。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s administration is putting pressure on Europe to ditch a rulebook that would compel developers of advanced artificial intelligence to follow stricter standards of transparency, risk-mitigation and copyright rules.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服集团以 3.62 亿美元收购香港零售经纪商控制权
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团同意以 28.1 亿港元（3.62 亿美元）的价格收购香港上市券商 Bright Smart Securities & Commodities Group 的控股权，以扩大其在香港的业务。【原文：Ant Group has agreed to buy a controlling stake in Hong Kong-listed brokerage Bright Smart Securities & Commodities Group for HK$2.81 billion ($362 million), in a move to expand its presence in the city.】

item.title: 加拿大 3 月份零售额回升 0.7
item.description: 上个月，加拿大消费者克服了关税战的不确定性，实现了自假日购物季以来最大的消费增长。【原文：Canadian consumers defied tariff-war uncertainty last month, with the biggest spending growth since the holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 非洲在贸易战中遭受附带损害。国际货币基金组织随时准备提供帮助
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战并冻结美国援助，非洲经济增长速度将低于预期，该组织同时承诺向有需要的国家提供支持。【原文：African economic growth will be slower than forecast due to President Donald Trump’s trade war and his freeze on US aid, the International Monetary Fund said, as it pledged to support countries in need.】

item.title: 巴西通胀率在议息会议前再次回升
item.description: 4 月初，巴西的年通胀率创下了约两年来的最快速度，这对准备在下个月连续第六次加息的决策者们提出了挑战。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation hit its fastest pace in about two years in early April, challenging policymakers as they prepare to deliver their sixth straight interest rate increase next month.】

item.title: 为什么投资者现在对黄金爱不释手？
item.description: 几个世纪以来，黄金一直是政治和经济不稳定时期的避风港资产。黄金作为一种可靠的高价值商品，可以方便地运输并在任何地方出售，当其他一切都处于动荡之中时，黄金给人一种安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 特朗普称将签署禁止国会股票交易法案
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他 "绝对 "会签署一项禁止国会股票交易的法案，他担心议员们可能会利用内幕消息谋取利益。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would “absolutely” sign a bill banning congressional stock trading, saying he was concerned lawmakers could be using insider information for an advantage.】

item.title: Point72 交易员退出，专注于新兴市场的交易舱关闭
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）已经关闭了一个主要专注于新兴市场资产的交易舱，最终导致两名交易员离职。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management has closed a trading pod that focused mostly on emerging-market assets, culminating in the departure of two traders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特发出信号：石油价格下跌不会阻碍其发展
item.description:
即使原油价格暴跌，OPEC+领导人仍考虑再次增加供应。【原文：

OPEC+ leader considers another supply surge even as crude prices plunge.

】

item.title: 高盛称外国投资者抛售了 630 亿美元的美国股票
item.description: 高盛策略师估计，自 3 月初以来，外国投资者已抛售了 630 亿美元的美国股票，并指出，高频资金流动数据表明，欧洲投资者一直在推动抛售，而其他地区则在继续买入美股。【原文：Foreign investors have sold $63 billion of US equities since the start of March, Goldman Sachs strategists estimate, noting that the data from high-frequency fund flows suggest that European investors have been driving the selling, while other regions have continued to buy US stocks.】

item.title: 中国电子制造商耸耸肩、开开玩笑，等待关税混乱过去
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Luz Ding 报道在香港举行的中国电子企业大型展览会上有关经济、关税和潜在贸易战的气氛。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Luz Ding reports on the mood about the economy, tariffs and a potential trade war at a major exhibition for Chinese electronics companies in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 美国发出取消对华关税信号，特朗普眨了眨眼睛
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，本周在华盛顿的国际经济企业编辑。今天我们关注中美贸易战的最新进展。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Washington this week. Today we’re looking at the latest state of play in the US-China trade war. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普认为贸易协议将在三至四周内达成
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他预计将很快与寻求降低关税的美国合作伙伴达成贸易协议。【原文：President Donald Trump said he expected to wrap up trade deals with US partners looking for lower tariffs soon.】

item.title: 北美历史最悠久的公司遭遇灭顶之灾。有人认为它的命运是可以避免的
item.description: 哈德逊湾公司（Hudson's Bay Co.哈德逊湾公司（Hudson Bay Co., ULC）是一家历史悠久的公司，曾在英国北美殖民地的货物贸易中发挥过核心作用。【原文：Hudson’s Bay Co. ULC, a company that’s so old it once played a central role for goods traders in Britain’s North American colonies, is being stripped for parts.】

item.title: 全球首只巨灾债券 ETF 在 "疯狂 "市场中失利
item.description: 全球首只基于巨灾债券的交易所交易基金在特朗普政府发动关税战前夕推出后，未能获得预期的种子资金。【原文：The world’s first-ever exchange-traded fund based on catastrophe bonds has failed to get the seed capital it expected after launching on the eve of the Trump administration’s tariff war.】

item.title: 英国央行取消投资和分红以应对资金紧张问题
item.description: 英格兰银行正在取消投资项目，并且不会再向英国政府支付红利，因为在伯南克对预测进行审查后，英格兰银行的预算面临压力。【原文：The Bank of England is scrapping investment projects and will not pay the UK government a dividend again, as its budget comes under strain amid an overhaul of forecasting following a review by Ben Bernanke.】

item.title: 腾讯音乐洽谈以 24 亿美元收购喜马拉雅
item.description: 据知情人士透露，腾讯音乐娱乐集团正在就收购中国播客初创公司喜马拉雅公司（Ximalaya Inc.【原文：Tencent Music Entertainment Group is in advanced talks to buy Chinese podcasting startup Ximalaya Inc. in a $2.4 billion deal that would accelerate its push to become China’s answer to Spotify Technology SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 南非第二大党排除退出联盟的可能性
item.description: 南非民主联盟（Democratic Alliance）领导人表示，尽管在关键政策和立法方面仍存在争论，但该党仍致力于成为南非联合政府的一部分，而且无意退出。【原文：The leader of South Africa’s Democratic Alliance said his party remains committed to being part of the nation’s coalition government despite ongoing wrangling over key policies and legislation, and has no intention of walking away.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将关键利率维持在历史最高水平，通胀担忧挥之不去
item.description: 俄罗斯央行将借贷成本维持在历史最高水平，重申将在 "很长一段时间内 "实施紧缩政策以抑制通胀。【原文：Russia’s central bank held borrowing costs at a record high, reiterating that tight policy will remain in place “for a long period” to tame inflation.】

item.title: 没有大科技，美国的盈利能力正在衰退
item.description:
几乎所有的利润率增长都来自于蓬勃发展的科技公司。【原文：

Nearly all the profit margin growth has come from booming technology companies. 

】

item.title: 外交顾问称特朗普在贸易战问题上 "误判 "了中国
item.description: 中国外交部的一位顾问表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统错误地估计了中国政府会屈服于经济压力，导致美国没有准备好应对当前的关税僵局。【原文：President Donald Trump misjudged Beijing by calculating that it would cave into economic pressure, leaving the US unprepared to handle the current tariff standoff, according to an adviser to China’s Foreign Ministry.】

item.title: 中国滴滴在香港招募顺风车司机
item.description: 中国的滴滴出行公司（Didi Global Inc.【原文：China’s Didi Global Inc. is quietly recruiting new drivers in Hong Kong as it looks to grow outside of mainland China.】
